dict.string: <key>NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription</key> <string>Your location is required for accurate notifactions benefits for you , also you cane disable it with no problem </string> <key>NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription</key> <string>Your location is required for accurate notifaction benefits for you lso you cane disable it with no problem </string>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd"> <plist version="1.0"> <dict> <key>CFBundleName</key> <string>Runner</string> <key>NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription</key> <string>We need your location to provide location-based task reminders.</string> <key>NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription</key> <string>We need your location to track tasks in the background.</string> </dict> </plist>
We need your location to provide location-based task reminders.
We need your location to track tasks in the background.

<key>UIBackgroundModes</key> <array> <string>fetch</string> <string>remote-notification</string> </array>
<key>NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription</key> <string>Your location is used to help track tasks near you.</string> <key>NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription</key> <string>Your location is used to help track tasks near you.</string> <key>UIUserTrackingUsageDescription</key> <string>We need to use your location to give you task notifications based on your location.</string>

<key>NSCalendarsUsageDescription</key> <string>Access most functions for calendar viewing and editing.</string>
<key>NSContactsUsageDescription</key> <string>Access contacts for event attendee editing.</string>

<key>NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription</key> <string>This app needs access to location when open to provide location-based reminders.</string> <key>NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription</key> <string>This app needs access to location when in the background for location-based reminders.</string>
<key>NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription</key> <string>Access most functions for calendar viewing and editing.</string>
<key>NSCalendarsUsageDescription</key> <string>We need calendar access to manage events.</string>
<key>NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription</key> <string>Your location is used to set location-based reminders.</string>
This app needs access to location when open to show your current location on the map.
This app needs access to location when in the background for navigation features.
